name: Color Dash (Pixel Paras)
description:
NOTE: THIS GAME WAS MADE COMPLETLY IN 1 HOUR. 

Color Dash is a fast paced RUN & JUMP game that requires you to always keep your eye on the platform you will land on and think about the future. because if you land on the platform of opposite color its death.

Controls

Jump: Space

Drop: Left Shift

Change Color: W
